steps.description:
This function sets parameters that control the application's window.

In this case, I want the app to always sit on top of all other running applications or documents. I then set the height and width, with minimum dimensions added since I also want the app to be resizable. I don't want to display a title at the top of the app, and I want the background to be see-through. I want to have access to Node in my app, and I don't want Dev Tools open (this is toggled when in development/production).

More options are available but have not been added here.

This simple function takes in an URL to an API, fetches the data as JSON.

In this instance, this data is parsed to retrieve a known value for the current price of Bitcoin in US dollars. Once we have this value, it is simply injected into a placeholder element, found in `index.html`
